frontpage.title: Shadows
frontpage.desc: Spyric Shadows is the one and <u>only</u> plugin for Solar2D that makes it possible to create all sorts of shadows in your games.

frontpage.title: Weaver
frontpage.desc: Spyric Weaver loads and interprets stories/files created in Twine 2 or Yarn, and runs them in Solar2D.

frontpage.title: BMFont
frontpage.desc: Based on PonyFont, Spyric BMFont makes it easy to use and stylize bitmap fonts in your projects.

frontpage.title: Progress Ring
frontpage.desc: Spyric Progress Ring allows you to create fully stylised, animated and fully controllable progress rings to your projects.

frontpage.title: Window
frontpage.desc: Spyric Window allows you to create windows or buttons of any size to your app using only a single small image as a source.

frontpage.title: Morph
frontpage.desc: Spyric Morph allows you to distort, scale and/or flip display objects and their attached physics bodies with ease.

frontpage.title: Font Loader
frontpage.desc: Spyric Font Loader will preload all of your custom fonts so that your app will run faster when it needs to use the fonts again.

frontpage.title: Resolution
frontpage.desc: Spyric Resolution makes it possible to dynamically change the resolution of your desktop games.

frontpage.title: Collisions
frontpage.desc: Spyric Collisions removes the calculations and guesswork from creating and managing collision filters.

frontpage.title: Get a Job, Baby!
frontpage.desc: You were just born but it's already time to pull your weight, so get a job, baby! Created for Ludum Dare 45 JAM.
